20110131030437.000|20110131030438.000|CC1|>> Kroft: JUST A FEW MONTHS AGO,
20110131030438.000|20110131030439.000|CC1|MOST PEOPLE HAD NEVER HEARD OF A
20110131030439.000|20110131030440.000|CC1|WEB SITE CALLED WIKILEAKS, OR OF
20110131030440.000|20110131030440.000|CC1|ITS MYSTERIOUS AND ECCENTRIC    
20110131030440.000|20110131030446.000|CC1|FOUNDER, JULIAN ASSANGE.        
20110131030446.000|20110131030448.000|CC1|BUT IN THAT SHORT PERIOD OF     
20110131030448.000|20110131030449.000|CC1|TIME, BOTH HAVE MANAGED TO      
20110131030449.000|20110131030450.000|CC1|RATTLE THE WORLDS OF JOURNALISM,
20110131030450.000|20110131030450.000|CC1|DIPLOMACY, AND NATIONAL         
20110131030450.000|20110131030452.000|CC1|SECURITY.                       
20110131030452.000|20110131030453.000|CC1|WIKILEAKS, WHICH SOLICITS AND   
20110131030453.000|20110131030455.000|CC1|PUBLISHES SECRETS AND SUPPRESSED
20110131030455.000|20110131030457.000|CC1|MATERIAL FROM WHISTLEBLOWERS    
20110131030457.000|20110131030459.000|CC1|AROUND THE WORLD, HAS BEEN UNDER
20110131030459.000|20110131030500.000|CC1|CYBER ATTACK FROM GOVERNMENTS   
20110131030500.000|20110131030503.000|CC1|THAT WANT TO SHUT IT DOWN.      
20110131030503.000|20110131030504.000|CC1|AND ASSANGE IS CURRENTLY UNDER  
20110131030504.000|20110131030505.000|CC1|LEGAL ATTACK FROM THE U.S.      
20110131030505.000|20110131030506.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT, WHICH WOULD LIKE TO 
20110131030506.000|20110131030508.000|CC1|CHARGE HIM WITH ESPIONAGE FOR   
20110131030508.000|20110131030509.000|CC1|PUBLISHING VOLUMES OF CLASSIFIED
20110131030509.000|20110131030509.000|CC1|MATERIAL FROM THE PENTAGON AND  
20110131030509.000|20110131030516.000|CC1|THE STATE DEPARTMENT.           
20110131030516.000|20110131030518.000|CC1|WE SPENT TWO DAYS WITH HIM IN   
20110131030518.000|20110131030519.000|CC1|BRITAIN, WHERE HE IS UNDER HOUSE
20110131030519.000|20110131030521.000|CC1|ARREST WHILE FIGHTING           
20110131030521.000|20110131030522.000|CC1|EXTRADITION TO SWEDEN FOR       
20110131030522.000|20110131030524.000|CC1|QUESTIONING IN TWO SEXUAL       
20110131030524.000|20110131030525.000|CC1|ASSAULT CASES, WHICH HE'S CALLED
20110131030525.000|20110131030525.000|CC1|PART OF A SMEAR CAMPAIGN AGAINST
20110131030525.000|20110131030526.000|CC1|HIM.                            
20110131030526.000|20110131030529.000|CC1|IN HIS MOST EXTENSIVE TELEVISION
20110131030529.000|20110131030530.000|CC1|INTERVIEW TO DATE, ASSANGE      
20110131030530.000|20110131030531.000|CC1|TALKED TO US ABOUT HIS WORK, HIS
20110131030531.000|20110131030532.000|CC1|VISION, AND THE PROSPECT OF     
20110131030532.000|20110131030533.000|CC1|FACING CRIMINAL CHARGES IN THE  
20110131030533.000|20110131030536.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.                  
20110131030536.000|20110131030536.000|CC1|YOU'VE BEEN CALLED A LOT OF     
20110131030536.000|20110131030538.000|CC1|NAMES.                          
20110131030538.000|20110131030540.000|CC1|YOU'VE BEEN CHARACTERIZED AS A  
20110131030540.000|20110131030542.000|CC1|HERO AND AS A VILLAIN, A MARTYR,
20110131030542.000|20110131030544.000|CC1|TERRORIST.                      
20110131030544.000|20110131030545.000|CC1|>> Assange: I'M NOT YET A       
20110131030545.000|20110131030546.000|CC1|MARTYR.                         
20110131030546.000|20110131030546.000|CC1|>> Kroft: RIGHT.                
20110131030546.000|20110131030547.000|CC1|>> Assange: LET'S KEEP IT THAT  
20110131030547.000|20110131030548.000|CC1|WAY.                            
20110131030548.000|20110131030549.000|CC1|>> Kroft: FOR NOW, JULIAN       
20110131030549.000|20110131030551.000|CC1|ASSANGE IS HOLED UP ON THIS     
20110131030551.000|20110131030554.000|CC1|BUCOLIC 600-ACRE ENGLISH ESTATE 
20110131030554.000|20110131030555.000|CC1|WITH AN ANKLE BRACELET, A 10:00 
20110131030555.000|20110131030556.000|CC1|CURFEW, AND A SLOW INTERNET     
20110131030556.000|20110131030559.000|CC1|CONNECTION.                     
20110131030559.000|20110131030600.000|CC1|HE DECLINED TO TALK TO US ABOUT 
20110131030600.000|20110131030602.000|CC1|THE ALLEGATIONS IN SWEDEN, ON   
20110131030602.000|20110131030604.000|CC1|THE ADVICE OF HIS ATTORNEY.     
20110131030604.000|20110131030605.000|CC1|HE HAS NOT BEEN CHARGED AND     
20110131030605.000|20110131030607.000|CC1|PROCLAIMS HIS INNOCENCE.        
20110131030607.000|20110131030608.000|CC1|WELL, I SUPPOSE IF YOU HAVE TO  
20110131030608.000|20110131030609.000|CC1|BE UNDER HOUSE ARREST, THERE    
20110131030609.000|20110131030611.000|CC1|COULD BE WORSE PLACES.          
20110131030611.000|20110131030612.000|CC1|>> Assange: WELL, IT'S A GILDED 
20110131030612.000|20110131030612.000|CC1|CAGE.                           
20110131030612.000|20110131030615.000|CC1|IT'S STILL A CAGE.              
20110131030615.000|20110131030616.000|CC1|BUT WHEN YOU ARE FORCED TO STAY 
20110131030616.000|20110131030618.000|CC1|SOMEWHERE AGAINST YOUR WILL, IT 
20110131030618.000|20110131030620.000|CC1|DOES BECOME SOMETHING THAT      
20110131030620.000|20110131030623.000|CC1|YOU... YOU WANT TO LEAVE.       
20110131030623.000|20110131030627.000|CC1|>> Kroft: IT'S A RADICAL        
20110131030627.000|20110131030628.000|CC1|DEPARTURE FROM THE LIFESTYLE    
20110131030628.000|20110131030629.000|CC1|THAT THE PERIPATETIC INTERNET   
20110131030629.000|20110131030631.000|CC1|MUCKRAKER IS USED TO-- BOUNDING 
20110131030631.000|20110131030632.000|CC1|FROM CITY TO CITY, COUNTRY TO   
20110131030632.000|20110131030633.000|CC1|COUNTRY, AND REGULARLY CHANGING 
20110131030633.000|20110131030635.000|CC1|HIS CELL PHONES, HAIR STYLES AND
20110131030635.000|20110131030636.000|CC1|GENERAL APPEARANCE, HE SAYS, TO 
20110131030636.000|20110131030638.000|CC1|ELUDE SURVEILLANCE AND AVOID    
20110131030638.000|20110131030639.000|CC1|BEING KILLED, KIDNAPPED OR      
20110131030639.000|20110131030642.000|CC1|ARRESTED.                       
20110131030642.000|20110131030643.000|CC1|AND THERE ARE REASONS FOR HIS   
20110131030643.000|20110131030644.000|CC1|PARANOIA.                       
20110131030644.000|20110131030645.000|CC1|IN THE LAST FOURS YEARS,        
20110131030645.000|20110131030647.000|CC1|WIKILEAKS HAS RELEASED          
20110131030647.000|20110131030648.000|CC1|INFORMATION THAT PLAYED SOME    
20110131030648.000|20110131030651.000|CC1|ROLE IN DECIDING THE 2007       
20110131030651.000|20110131030652.000|CC1|ELECTION IN KENYA, AND FUELING  
20110131030652.000|20110131030653.000|CC1|THE ANGER THAT RECENTLY BROUGHT 
20110131030653.000|20110131030657.000|CC1|DOWN THE GOVERNMENT IN TUNISIA. 
20110131030657.000|20110131030658.000|CC1|IT HAS ALSO DIVULGED THE        
20110131030658.000|20110131030659.000|CC1|MEMBERSHIP ROLLS OF A NEO-NAZI  
20110131030659.000|20110131030701.000|CC1|ORGANIZATION IN BRITAIN, AND    
20110131030701.000|20110131030702.000|CC1|SECRET DOCUMENTS FROM THE CHURCH
20110131030702.000|20110131030704.000|CC1|OF SCIENTOLOGY.                 
20110131030704.000|20110131030705.000|CC1|AND THAT WAS BEFORE ASSANGE     
20110131030705.000|20110131030707.000|CC1|BEGAN PUBLISHING U.S. SECRETS,  
20110131030707.000|20110131030708.000|CC1|PROVOKING WHAT HE CALLS         
20110131030708.000|20110131030709.000|CC1|"THREATENING STATEMENTS" FROM   
20110131030709.000|20110131030711.000|CC1|PEOPLE CLOSE TO POWER.          
20110131030711.000|20110131030711.000|CC1|WHAT STATEMENTS ARE YOU         
20110131030711.000|20110131030713.000|CC1|REFERRING TO?                   
20110131030713.000|20110131030716.000|CC1|>> Assange: THE STATEMENTS BY   
20110131030716.000|20110131030718.000|CC1|THE VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN SAYING,
20110131030718.000|20110131030719.000|CC1|FOR INSTANCE, THAT I WAS A HIGH-
20110131030719.000|20110131030723.000|CC1|TECH TERRORIST.                 
20110131030723.000|20110131030724.000|CC1|SARAH PALIN CALLING TO OUR      
20110131030724.000|20110131030725.000|CC1|ORGANIZATION TO BE DEALT WITH   
20110131030725.000|20110131030726.000|CC1|LIKE THE TALIBAN AND BE HUNTED  
20110131030726.000|20110131030728.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20110131030728.000|20110131030730.000|CC1|THERE'S CALLS EITHER FOR MY     
20110131030730.000|20110131030731.000|CC1|ASSASSINATION OR THE            
20110131030731.000|20110131030733.000|CC1|ASSASSINATION OF MY STAFF, OR   
20110131030733.000|20110131030734.000|CC1|FOR US TO BE KIDNAPPED AND      
20110131030734.000|20110131030735.000|CC1|RENDITIONED BACK TO THE UNITED  
20110131030735.000|20110131030738.000|CC1|STATES TO BE EXECUTED.          
20110131030738.000|20110131030739.000|CC1|>> Kroft: WELL, AS YOU KNOW, WE 
20110131030739.000|20110131030740.000|CC1|HAVE A FIRST AMENDMENT, AND     
20110131030740.000|20110131030741.000|CC1|PEOPLE CAN SAY WHATEVER THEY    
20110131030741.000|20110131030744.000|CC1|WANT, INCLUDING POLITICIANS.    
20110131030744.000|20110131030745.000|CC1|I DON'T THINK THAT MANY PEOPLE  
20110131030745.000|20110131030747.000|CC1|IN THE UNITED STATES TOOK       
20110131030747.000|20110131030748.000|CC1|SERIOUSLY THE IDEA THAT YOU WERE
20110131030748.000|20110131030751.000|CC1|A TERRORIST.                    
20110131030751.000|20110131030751.000|CC1|>> Assange: I WOULD LIKE TO     
20110131030751.000|20110131030753.000|CC1|BELIEVE THAT.                   
20110131030753.000|20110131030754.000|CC1|ON THE OTHER HAND, THE          
20110131030754.000|20110131030755.000|CC1|INCITEMENTS TO MURDER ARE A     
20110131030755.000|20110131030758.000|CC1|SERIOUS ISSUE.                  
20110131030758.000|20110131030759.000|CC1|AND UNFORTUNATELY, THERE IS A   
20110131030759.000|20110131030801.000|CC1|PORTION OF THE POPULATION THAT  
20110131030801.000|20110131030802.000|CC1|WILL BELIEVE IN THEM AND MAY    
20110131030802.000|20110131030805.000|CC1|CARRY THEM OUT.                 
20110131030805.000|20110131030806.000|CC1|>> Kroft: IF NOTHING ELSE,      
20110131030806.000|20110131030807.000|CC1|WIKILEAKS IS THE LATEST         
20110131030807.000|20110131030809.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATION THAT A SMALL GROUP
20110131030809.000|20110131030810.000|CC1|OF PEOPLE WITH A POWERFUL IDEA  
20110131030810.000|20110131030811.000|CC1|CAN HARNESS TECHNOLOGY AND

20110131032513.000|20110131032514.000|CC1|I... WHERE I STAYED LONG ENOUGH,

20110131032517.000|20110131032518.000|CC1|>> Kroft: ONE OF THE FIRST      
20110131032518.000|20110131032519.000|CC1|PLACES ASSANGE FOUND HIS WAY

20110131032527.000|20110131032531.000|CC1|PRETTY EARLY, WITH HACKING?

20110131034033.000|20110131034035.000|CC1|THICK, DARK BRUSH.              
20110131034035.000|20110131034037.000|CC1|IT'S BECAUSE OF THEIR ELUSIVE   
20110131034037.000|20110131034039.000|CC1|NATURE, THEIR POWER, AND THEIR  
20110131034039.000|20110131034040.000|CC1|BEAUTY THAT JAGUARS HAVE LONG   
20110131034040.000|20110131034043.000|CC1|BEEN WORSHIPPED BY TRIBES AS    
20110131034043.000|20110131034044.000|CC1|DEMIGODS WHOSE REAL HOME IS A   
20110131034044.000|20110131034045.000|CC1|SPIRITUAL WORLD WHICH MAN CANNOT
20110131034045.000|20110131034050.000|CC1|EVEN FATHOM.                    
20110131034050.000|20110131034051.000|CC1|BUT WHICHEVER WORLD THEY        
20110131034051.000|20110131034053.000|CC1|FREQUENT, THEY ONLY EMERGE,     
20110131034053.000|20110131034054.000|CC1|BRIEFLY, DURING THE DRY SEASON  
20110131034054.000|20110131034055.000|CC1|WHEN THEY GO DOWN TO RIVERS TO  
20110131034055.000|20110131034057.000|CC1|DRINK.                          
20110131034057.000|20110131034058.000|CC1|SO WHEN IT GOT DRY IN SEPTEMBER,
20110131034058.000|20110131034101.000|CC1|AND ALAN RABINOWITZ, THE WORLD'S
20110131034101.000|20110131034103.000|CC1|FOREMOST AUTHORITY ON JAGUARS,  
20110131034103.000|20110131034105.000|CC1|INVITED US TO GO WITH HIM TO    
20110131034105.000|20110131034109.000|CC1|SOME FAR-FLUNG WETLANDS IN      
20110131034109.000|20110131034110.000|CC1|BRAZIL NEAR THE BOLIVIAN BORDER,
20110131034110.000|20110131034110.000|CC1|WE PICKED UP THE PHONE AND      
20110131034110.000|20110131034113.000|CC1|BOOKED OUR FLIGHTS.             
20110131034113.000|20110131034115.000|CC1|WE HEADED TOWARDS AN UNSPOILED, 
20110131034115.000|20110131034116.000|CC1|REMOTE AREA CALLED THE PANTANAL,
20110131034116.000|20110131034119.000|CC1|WHERE THE TEMPERATURE RARELY    
20110131034119.000|20110131034123.000|CC1|DIPPED BELOW 115 DEGREES.

20110131034129.000|20110131034131.000|CC1|PIRANHAS AND CAYMANS, COUSINS TO
20110131034131.000|20110131034135.000|CC1|THE CROCODILE.

20110131034138.000|20110131034139.000|CC1|WE STARTED OUR SEARCH FOR       
20110131034139.000|20110131034141.000|CC1|JAGUARS ON THE CUIABA RIVER WITH

20110131034149.000|20110131034149.000|CC1|FAST AND HAVE BEEN KNOWN TO KILL
20110131034149.000|20110131034150.000|CC1|PEOPLE.

20110131034806.000|20110131034807.000|CC1|I COULDN'T SING VERY WELL.
